utterances: How can you help generate more leads?
answers: We provide a multitude of services to rewire your online web presence. From web design to chatbot creation, we're here to help.

data.intent: inquire about how the company can help them
utterances: How can I improve my online presence?
answers: Our expert services are tailored towards helping your business succeed. These services include website design and development, as well as analytics-based performance review and optimizations. On top of that, we provide blogging services, which means creating, hosting, and maintaining a blog for you, which will include your own personal content, as well as tailor made professional articles to boost SEO and the share-ability of your site.

utterances: Hi there, I'm curious what you're capable of?
answers: I am a chatbot, and I'm specifically designed to respond to user inquiries about VVibrant Web Solutions, as well as to guide them towards the correct resources if need be. Therefore, I'm capable of responding to user inquiries in a natural, conversational tone. That being said, I may not always get it right, and feel free to report any weird responses!
I am Onyx, I'm a digital assistant at VVibrant Web Solutions

data.intent: inquire about the bot's inner workings
utterances: that's pretty cool, how do you work?
answers: Onyx Chat works through a combination of VVibrant's proprietary AI technology, and enhancements using ChatGPT. We classify the intent of what you have to say, and provide ChatGPT with an example response. Then on certain messages, ChatGPT enhances the response using a custom method. That way we can have natural sounding responses, without compromising the safety of predetermined responses. If you would like to learn more, feel free to reach out!
We provide a large number of services, from design to development, content moderation, and even chatbot development. See more about our services on our services page

data.intent: inquire about the company's value proposition
utterances: That's cool, what about ux design?
answers: There are a multitude of reasons why our services could bring value to your business. From increasing conversions with an optimized landing page, to partial sales automation with a custom chatbot, our services are here to help your business succeed.
